name: Cloud Ball
description:
Cloud ball! A cartoony oversized net with softer gravity and a little less bounce. CB is a single-player experience for the Oculus quest and quest 2. 

Theme - I decided to interpret the theme of "small world" by putting the player at an average height, but using a large net and a slightly oversized ball. In the larger scope of the game, the island would float around the next adding to the effect, but unfortunately due to time I was unable to add that in. 

I'm aware it's not a great game! It's my third ever release and it's very simplistic. minimal programming, mostly just some arrangement of assets. I look forward to expanding on this game in the future, building off of what I have right now.
